about.header: Iron Girl Washing and Ironing Service
about.intro1: Are you too busy and have no time to wash or iron?
about.intro2: We'll gladly take it off your hands.
about.intro3: Is ironing too heavy for you or do you have too much to iron?
about.intro4: We take care of all your ironing, from clothing to bedding and linens.
about.intro5: Even if you prefer to leave the washing to us, you can count on us. It's even easier to let us handle both the washing and ironing.
about.intro6: This makes your life easier, and you'll have more time for fun things. You can always contact us to bring your laundry and ironing to us in Vleuten.
